bibl.author: Whitman, Walt
bibl.title: From wooded Maine, ca. 1889
bibl.orgName: Papers of Walt Whitman (MSS 3829), Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Albert H. Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia
bibl.note: Transcribed from digital images of the original.
On the Verso is a letter from Sara Stewart McGee Forsyth to Whitman dated 14 August 1889.

lg.l:
From wooded Maine and many a
New England's farms, and farm
fertile Pennsylvania,
The boundless West, the South, ‸the Carolinas Texas,
